chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during 2018.

chromas.name: Bewitching Janna
chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive during 2018.

champions.name: Gangplank
champions.title: the Saltwater Scourge
champions.shortBio: As unpredictable as he is brutal, the dethroned reaver king Gangplank is feared far and wide. Once, he ruled the port city of Bilgewater, and while his reign is over, there are those who believe this has only made him more dangerous. Gangplank would see Bilgewater bathed in blood once more before letting someone else take itâ€”and now with pistol, cutlass, and barrels of gunpowder, he is determined to reclaim what he has lost.

skins.name: Toy Soldier Gangplank
skins.description: Gangplank is a model soldier in the toy army, racking up an impressive array of victories against the dolls and stuffed animals. He hopes to one day be named Toy General, leading his troops into glorious battle.

skins.name: Captain Gangplank
skins.description: Gangplank was a legendary murderer and cutthroat, prior to having his ship blown up while he was still on it. The silhouette of his famed captain's jacket is still burned into the memory of more than one unlucky sailor... with many convinced the man is somehow still alive.

skins.name: Dreadnova Gangplank
skins.description: Once a high ranking admiral in the Royal Space Military, Gangplank's reign of terror began when he stole and proliferated blueprints for a former colleague's experimental superweapon. Ending a thousand-year civil war in an instant, he defected with a massive armed battalion and formed the interplanetary criminal network known as the Dreadnova Corps.

skins.name: Pool Party Gangplank
skins.description: Gangplank is the self-crowned King of the Grill, but his summer bod is the real life of the party. There should be a law against those abs.

chromas.name: Pool Party Gangplank
chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during 2018.

champions.name: Corki
champions.title: the Daring Bombardier
champions.shortBio: The yordle pilot Corki loves two things above all others: flying, and his glamorous mustache... though not necessarily in that order. After leaving Bandle City, he settled in Piltover and fell in love with the wondrous machines he found there. He dedicated himself to the development of flying contraptions, leading an aerial defense force of seasoned veterans known as the Screaming Yipsnakes. Calm under fire, Corki patrols the skies around his adopted home, and has never encountered a problem that a good missile barrage couldn't solve.

skins.name: Ice Toboggan Corki
skins.description: Having broken the land-speed record in most other vehicular sports, Corki has turned his attention to the ice lugeâ€”a momentum-based activity that doesn't require a state-of-the-art flying sled with a forward-mounted machine gun. He brought one anyway.

skins.name: Hot Rod Corki
skins.description: Your plane's sheeting was busted, so we replaced it with a bullet-resistant alloy, and four-cylinder external mounted coal engine. Plus we painted flames on the front. No extra charge.

skins.name: Dragonwing Corki
skins.description: Corki's pit crew made sure to outfit him with a special ship for Lunar Revel, emblazoned with the visage of a dragon to scare off evil spirits. It has been further modified to spray bullets and fire explosivesâ€¦ presumably also to scare off evil spirits.

chromas.name: Dragonwing Corki
chromas.description: Loot exclusive gained from the 2018 Lunar Revel missions.

skins.name: Fnatic Corki
skins.description: Honoring LaMiaZeaLoT's winning performance as Corki during the 2011 World Championship.

skins.name: Arcade Corki
skins.description: The fearless protagonist of a 1980s top-down shooter, Corki resists Veigar's battle bosses the same way he resists being shot down by thousands of glowing bulletsâ€”move fast, and shoot everything before it shoots him.

champions.name: Karma
champions.title: the Enlightened One
champions.shortBio: No mortal exemplifies the spiritual traditions of Ionia more than Karma. She is the living embodiment of an ancient soul reincarnated countless times, carrying all her accumulated memories into each new life, and blessed with power that few can comprehend. She has done her best to guide her people in recent times of crisis, though she knows that peace and harmony may come only at a considerable costâ€”both to her, and to the land she holds most dear.

skins.name: Sun Goddess Karma
skins.description: An ageless being in whom the sun rises and sets, Karma is the key to an ancient prophecy spelling doom for the world. When she is overtaken by the moon, four titans will rise up from the depths of the earth, annihilating all life.

skins.name: Traditional Karma
skins.description: Created to capture the original feel of Karma, one of our first fully reworked champions.

skins.name: Warden Karma
skins.description: The Protectorate was an order dedicated to enforcing a rigid, unforgiving system of laws, in an attempt to slow the seemingly inevitable rise of the Magelords. Though the order itself was disbanded long ago, Wardens such as Karma still uphold its tenetsâ€¦ and guard its many secrets.

skins.name: Winter Wonder Karma
skins.description: A powerful sorceress at one with the natural world, Karma spreads snow like a soft blanket across the enchanted forests of the Winterlands. A loyal friend of the Poro Kingâ€”wherever Karma goes, winter follows.

skins.name: Conqueror Karma
skins.description: Commemorating the 2017 Mid-Season Invitational in Brazil.

champions.name: Taric
champions.title: the Shield of Valoran
champions.shortBio: Taric is the Aspect of the Protector, wielding incredible power as Runeterra's guardian of life, love, and beauty. Shamed by a dereliction of duty and exiled from his homeland Demacia, Taric ascended Mount Targon to find redemption, only to discover a higher calling among the stars. Imbued with the might of ancient Targon, the Shield of Valoran now stands ever vigilant against the insidious corruption of the Void.

skins.name: Emerald Taric
skins.description: The Knights of the Emerald Chapel are the once-human stewards of the Elderwoodâ€”men and women who swore an oath to the land itself, and in return were granted unnaturally long life. Now led by a man named Taric, a handful reside there still, protecting the forest from all manner of invaders.

skins.name: Armor of the Fifth Age Taric
Pool Party Taric
skins.description: Always on the alert, Taric will run in cinematic slow motion to save any swimmer in distress. Although, Taric has failed to save a distressing number of them.

champions.name: Veigar
champions.title: the Tiny Master of Evil
champions.shortBio: An enthusiastic master of dark sorcery, Veigar has embraced powers that few mortals dare approach. As a free-spirited inhabitant of Bandle City, he longed to push beyond the limitations of yordle magic, and turned instead to arcane texts that had been hidden away for thousands of years. Now a stubborn creature with an endless fascination for the mysteries of the universe, Veigar is often underestimated by othersâ€”but even though he believes himself truly evil, he possesses an inner morality that leads some to question his deeper motivations.

skins.name: Curling Veigar
skins.description: Curling is a sport where players slide stones across the ice with a stick. Veigar is an evil yordle obsessed with annihilating the great cities of Valoran. It just makes sense.

skins.name: Veigar Greybeard
skins.description: A suspiciously helpful wizard the party meets early in their adventure, Veigar Greybeard holds a dastardly secretâ€”he's the true villain of Riftquest! Of course, this is obvious to anyone who played the starter campaign, but you still shouldn't spoil it for newcomers.

skins.name: Leprechaun Veigar
skins.description: Contrary to popular belief, Veigar won't grant three wishes, isn't a fairy, and doesn't hide gold coins at the end of a rainbow. He will, however, kill you. Which is none of the things you want out of a magic leprechaun.

skins.name: Bad Santa Veigar
skins.description: Most Santas wish to bring joy and enchantment to children everywhere, but Veigar wants no such thing. His dark ambitions have grown beyond simply thwarting Snowdownâ€”he schemes to throw the world into chaos, blotting out the holidays with his evil forever.

skins.name: Final Boss Veigar
skins.description: Once merely a mini-boss with a Napoleon complex, Veigar has ripped into the code of Arcade World to summon hundreds of other bosses to his side. Together they'll stop at nothing to reach his ultimate goal: take the world for himself, and give the heroes a final Game Over.

skins.name: Omega Squad Veigar
skins.description: A heavy artillery specialist with a serious chip on his shoulder, Veigar has a troubling habit of calling down huge amounts of explosive ordnance for even the most mundane problems. He thinks of it as â€śa fun quirk.â€ť

champions.name: Trundle
champions.title: the Troll King
champions.shortBio: Trundle is a hulking and devious troll with a particularly vicious streak, and there is nothing he cannot bludgeon into submissionâ€”not even the Freljord itself. Fiercely territorial, he chases down anyone foolish enough to enter his domain. Then, his massive club of True Ice at the ready, he chills his enemies to the bone and impales them with jagged, frozen pillars, laughing as they bleed out onto the tundra.

skins.name: Junkyard Trundle
skins.description: Self-proclaimed king of the Wasteland's endless, irradiated junk heaps, Trundle saunters about his vast 'kingdom' flanked by a small army of sycophantic thugs. Any travelers discovered in his domain are subjected to painfully theatrical displays of grandeurâ€”then beatings, then death.

skins.name: Traditional Trundle
skins.description: Created to capture the original feel of Trundle, one of our first fully reworked champions.

skins.name: Worldbreaker Trundle
skins.description: The second of four titans prophesied to shatter the world, it has been foretold that Trundle will appear when the moon smothers the sun. In that darkness, he will rise in the north, blanketing all of creation with frost until the land is cold and silent.

champions.name: Swain
champions.title: the Noxian Grand General
champions.shortBio: Jericho Swain is the visionary ruler of Noxus, an expansionist nation that reveres only strength. Though he was cast down and crippled in the Ionian wars, his left arm severed, he seized control of the empire with ruthless determinationâ€¦ and a new, demonic hand. Now, Swain commands from the front lines, marching against a coming darkness that only he can seeâ€”in glimpses gathered by shadowy ravens from the corpses all around him. In a swirl of sacrifice and secrets, the greatest secret of all is that the true enemy lies within.

skins.name: Northern Front Swain
skins.description: They could have sent an armyâ€”twelve helicarriers boasting hypercoil cannons, pulse-jumping shocktroopers, and mechs to carve through the ice. But instead, a lone, grizzled veteran striding across the tundra. Some things are better left to the Grand General.

skins.name: Bilgewater Swain
skins.description: What is a ruthless dictator to do, when he tires of the burdens of empire? It's a pirate's life for Swain, m'hearties! Plying the seas outside Bilgewater, his flagship, the Beatrice prowlsâ€”searching for storm wracked and serpent-choked vessels, each carrying the promise of plunder and souls.

skins.name: Tyrant Swain
skins.description: Swain, though a mighty leader of men, was no match for the ancient demon slumbering beneath Noxus. As dark energies flowed through his once-human body, the new Grand General gave his first decree: â€śKneel before me, or die.â€ť

skins.name: Dragon Master Swain
skins.description: Seeking to turn the very essence of dragons against them, the great Dragonslayer Swain battled beneath the earth for the souls of ancient, long-dead wyrms. In his hubris, he was consumed by their power, emerging a corrupted thrall of the monsters he once swore to destroy.

champions.name: Caitlyn
champions.title: the Sheriff of Piltover
champions.shortBio: Renowned as its finest peacekeeper, Caitlyn is also Piltover's best shot at ridding the city of its elusive criminal elements. She is often paired with Vi, acting as a cool counterpoint to her partner's more impetuous nature. Even though she carries a one-of-a-kind hextech rifle, Caitlyn's most powerful weapon is her superior intellect, allowing her to lay elaborate traps for any lawbreakers foolish enough to operate in the City of Progress.

skins.name: Resistance Caitlyn
skins.description: Caitlyn, designated resistance sniper, has never forgiven herself for letting Viktor's rise go unchecked for so long. Determined to fire the round that ends the war for good, she has personally gunned down hundreds of Battlecast machines in her bloody search for absolution.

skins.name: Sheriff Caitlyn
skins.description: The Old West lies far outside the government's jurisdiction, leaving local peacekeepers to enforce whatever passes for justice on the high frontier. As lone sheriff of the town of Progress, Caitlyn has found that the arm of the law is roughly as long as the range of her rifle.

skins.name: Arctic Warfare Caitlyn
skins.description: Very few snipers can cut it on the Arctic front. The snow is too cold, the winds are too hard... and of course, Caitlyn usually kills all hostile snipers before they can fire a single shot.

skins.name: Headhunter Caitlyn
skins.description: Caitlyn's arsenal of alien weaponry isn't meant to level the playing field. It's to ensure that every hunt, every target, and every shot she takes goes exactly the way she wants it to.

skins.name: Lunar Wraith Caitlyn
skins.description: A malignant spirit said to appear during Lunar Revel, Caitlyn is known to meddle in the affairs of gods and mortals alike. Her attention has been catastrophic to all who draw it, and even seeing her is considered an ill omen.

chromas.name: Lunar Wraith Caitlyn
chromas.description: Loot exclusive gained from the 2018 Lunar Revel missions.

skins.name: Pulsefire Caitlyn
skins.description: A legendary chrono-law enforcer feared in every age, Caitlyn's mission is to protect the fragile enigma that is time. Those who dare threaten its integrity inevitably find themselves firmly locked in the sights of her temporal plasma blaster.

skins.name: Pool Party Caitlyn
skins.description: For Caitlyn, nothing says a perfect summer's day like lounging at a luxurious poolside, eating shaved ice and drinking tropical libations. And shooting people. She really loves shooting people.

chromas.name: Pool Party Caitlyn
chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during 2018.

champions.name: Blitzcrank
champions.title: the Great Steam Golem
champions.shortBio: Blitzcrank is an enormous, near-indestructible automaton from Zaun, originally built to dispose of hazardous waste. However, he found this primary purpose too restricting, and modified his own form to better serve the fragile people of the Sump. Blitzcrank selflessly uses his strength and durability to protect others, extending a helpful metal fist or burst of energy to subdue any troublemakers.

skins.name: Goalkeeper Blitzcrank
skins.description: One of the all time greatest keepers for Chaos FC, Blitzcrank has finally taken his place in the Sports Hall of Fame. His image rests proudly with the likes of Volleyball Dragon, Women's Tennis Scuttle Crab, and Badminton Baron Nashor.

skins.name: Piltover Customs Blitzcrank
skins.description: Your robot's legs were busted, so we replaced them with a vintage '32 hot rod, and eight-cylinder external mounted coal engine. Plus we painted flames on his fists. The flames cost extra.

skins.name: iBlitzcrank
skins.description: Built as household assistance automata, thousands of iBlitzcranks were corrupted by Program during a routine software update. With their human owners oblivious to this fact, they continue to help, waiting patiently for the time their new command lines are initiated.

skins.name: Riot Blitzcrank
skins.description: A Riot Games skin obtained by either meeting a Rioter or attending an official Riot event in 2013.

skins.name: Battle Boss Blitzcrank
skins.description: A boss hailing from a popular science fiction shooter, Blitzcrank is well known in the gaming community for cheap mechanics, powerful attacks, and a massive health pool. Veigar fittingly made him the gatekeeper of his personal fortress, because Veigar hates fun.

skins.name: Lancer Rogue Blitzcrank
skins.description: An ancient sentinel corrupted by mysterious black lightning, Rogue Lancer Blitzcrank mercilessly crushes provincial armies, destroying entire castles with kings still on their thrones. What caused its rampage is still uncertain, but for now it seems to be following its dread protocol to the letter.

skins.name: Lancer Paragon Blitzcrank
skins.description: A silent protector of the masses, the artificial paladin Blitzcrank was aroused from the earth by a bolt of mysterious white lighting. It now serves all honorable subjects, defending with true and calculated precision.

champions.name: Malphite
champions.title: Shard of the Monolith
champions.shortBio: A massive creature of living stone, Malphite struggles to impose blessed order on a chaotic world. Birthed as a servitor-shard to an otherworldly obelisk known as the Monolith, he used his tremendous elemental strength to maintain and protect his progenitor, but ultimately failed. The only survivor of the destruction that followed, Malphite now endures Runeterra's soft folk and their fluid temperaments, while struggling to find a new role worthy of the last of his kind.

skins.name: Obsidian Malphite
skins.description: As great mountains were ripped from their foundations during the rise of the Ashen Lord, from deep beneath them climbed strange, obsidian creatures, freed for the first time after thousands of years. They seem intent on stopping the Infernals, and are uniquely suited to defeating them.

skins.name: Mecha Malphite
skins.description: Designated M-2, the â€śMecha Malphiteâ€ť unit is a massive, bipedal fortress capable of turning into a planetary drillâ€”making it the ultimate defensive option when faced with new and powerful kaiju. A single punch from its gauntlets can blow holes through thick titanium sheeting, and such attacks have felled countless monsters.

skins.name: Ironside Malphite
skins.description: There are two kinds of mercenaries in the game today: the first being your rank-and-file sellsword, barely worth the stink of grog on his breath. The second is a nigh-indestructible golem, twenty feet tall, and made from the hull of a legendary gunship. Choose wisely.

skins.name: Odyssey Malphite
skins.description: Malphite was once the pit boss of a deep space mining operation, until Jinx cracked the asteroid in half and got them both fired. His enduring loyalty to someone who is very obviously a psychopath has landed him in all kinds of danger across the galaxy, but he honestly doesn't seem to mind.

chromas.name: Odyssey Malphite
chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during 2018.

champions.name: Katarina
champions.title: the Sinister Blade
champions.shortBio: Decisive in judgment and lethal in combat, Katarina is a Noxian assassin of the highest caliber. Eldest daughter to the legendary General Du Couteau, she made her talents known with swift kills against unsuspecting enemies. Her fiery ambition has driven her to pursue heavily-guarded targets, even at the risk of endangering her alliesâ€”but no matter the mission, Katarina will not hesitate to execute her duty amid a whirlwind of serrated daggers.

skins.name: Red Card Katarina
skins.description: Is that a regulation uniform? No. Should a referee be holding a large dagger in the middle of a sports game? No. Are you going to argue with a woman in a non-regulation uniform holding a large dagger in the middle of a sports game? I think we both know the answer to that.

skins.name: Kitty Cat Katarina
skins.description: There are times when Katarina deeply questions the parameters of her assassination missions. This is, somehow, not one of those times.

skins.name: Slay Belle Katarina
skins.description: Donning a mishmash of Snowdown fashions to throw targets off her scent, Katarina uses the holidays as a cover for high profile assassinations. If you hear the sound of jingle bells... run.

skins.name: Warring Kingdoms Katarina
skins.description: In open defiance of her clan, Katarina has left behind the life of a princess to hunt the greatest heroes of the Warring Kingdoms. Striking under shadow of night, she is slowly cutting her way through her foesâ€¦ one general at a time.

chromas.name: Warring Kingdoms Katarina
chromas.description: Loot exclusive gained from the 2018 Lunar Revel missions.

skins.name: PROJECT: Katarina
skins.description: Once an ambitious lieutenant in the G/NETIC rebellion, Katarina returned to the Command Line after a confrontation with Ashe herself. Her hyper edge daggers now serve PROJECT once more, but those rebels who knew her still hold out hope that she fights for them from the inside.

skins.name: Death Sworn Katarina
skins.description: To fully swear oneself to Death's service, a mortal must be prepared to sacrifice the living. A skilled assassin in life, Katarina pledged her sinister blades willingly, and was granted spectral abilities allowing her to pass in and out of the underworld with ease.

champions.name: Nocturne
champions.title: the Eternal Nightmare
champions.shortBio: A demonic amalgamation drawn from the nightmares that haunt every sentient mind, the thing known as Nocturne has become a primordial force of pure evil. It is liquidly chaotic in aspect, a faceless shadow with cold eyes and armed with wicked-looking blades. After freeing itself from the spirit realm, Nocturne descended upon the waking world, to feed upon the kind of terror that can only thrive in true darkness.

skins.name: Haunting Nocturne
skins.description: Haunting Nocturne would be a lot less haunting without those huge knife arms.

skins.name: Cursed Revenant Nocturne
skins.description: In her dreams, the queen was approached by a great shadow whispering of power and infamy beyond the grasp of mortals. Upon the shadow's third visit, she released it into the waking worldâ€”and sure enough, it would come to keep its terrible promises.

champions.name: Maokai
champions.title: the Twisted Treant
champions.shortBio: Maokai is a rageful, towering treant who fights the unnatural horrors of the Shadow Isles. He was twisted into a force of vengeance after a magical cataclysm destroyed his home, surviving undeath only through the Waters of Life infused within his heartwood. Once a peaceful nature spirit, Maokai now furiously battles to banish the scourge of unlife from the Shadow Isles and restore his home to its former beauty.

skins.name: Charred Maokai
skins.description: Once a steward of the gentle treefolk, Maokai was consumed along with his people when the Infernals ravaged the world. Now, brimming with rage, he seeks only to spread his anger and misery to anything that crosses his path.

skins.name: Festive Maokai
skins.description: Big, jolly, and possessed by a literal holiday spirit, the living fir tree known as Maokai loves nothing more than to unwrap the presents tucked under him every year. He would prefer to do this away from the fire.

skins.name: Haunted Maokai
skins.description: Few locals dare to trick-or-treat past the forest just outside of town. Too many have vanished within that dreary woodland, where one feels the weight of unseen eyes, and even the trees are driven by a terrible hungerâ€¦

skins.name: Goalkeeper Maokai
skins.description: Debuting in the 2014 Soccer Cup, much of Maokai's career has rested on the Order United goalposts growing out of his back. As Maokai is a giant tree, you have to be pretty good to score on him.

skins.name: Victorious Maokai
skins.description: Victorious Maokai was awarded to players who reached Gold or higher in the 2016 season. Victorious Maokai lays down his roots fashionably with vines of golden leaves, and a rich blue and gold robe.

champions.name: Renekton
champions.title: the Butcher of the Sands
champions.shortBio: Renekton is a terrifying, rage-fueled Ascended being from the scorched deserts of Shurima. Once, he was his empire's most esteemed warrior, leading the nation's armies to countless victories. However, after the empire's fall, Renekton was entombed beneath the sands, and slowly, as the world turned and changed, he succumbed to insanity. Now free once more, he is utterly consumed with finding and killing his brother, Nasus, who he blames, in his madness, for the centuries he spent in darkness.

skins.name: Scorched Earth Renekton
skins.description: What is an Infernal but the screams beckoning from the darkest corners of mortal imagination? For centuries they were considered nothing more than mythâ€”and yet, now, monstrosities such as Renekton roam freely, punishing us all for the last fleeting gasp of our own hubris.

skins.name: Pool Party Renekton
skins.description: Lifeguard on duty! Seriously though, be carefulâ€”you don't want CPR from a nine foot tall crocodile man.

skins.name: Prehistoric Renekton
skins.description: A rare intelligent beast, Renekton is an erudite speaker and skilled wielder of the crescent blade. He's also six stories tall and not particularly friendly. Hunters are advised to make their final arrangements before engaging.

skins.name: SKT T1 Renekton
skins.description: Honoring MaRin's winning performance as Renekton during the 2015 World Championship.

skins.name: Renektoy
skins.description: First produced in 1996, Renektoy quickly and unexpectedly became the must-have gift of the season. Shortages and heightened demand led to online scalping, parents fist fighting in store aisles, and a small number of what police later described as â€śmall stampedes.â€ť

skins.name: Hextech Renekton
skins.description: As is so often the way, artificers of the Hextech Renaissance pushed too far and too fast into their new science, without fully considering the possible consequences. Renektonâ€”a half-mad monster of flesh and metalâ€”is the result of that shortsightedness.

champions.name: Jarvan IV
champions.title: the Exemplar of Demacia
champions.shortBio: Prince Jarvan, scion of the Lightshield dynasty, is heir apparent to the throne of Demacia. Raised to be a paragon of his nation's greatest virtues, he is forced to balance the heavy expectations placed upon him with his own desire to fight on the front lines. Jarvan inspires his troops with his fearsome courage and selfless determination, raising his family's colors high and revealing his true strength as a future leader of his people.

skins.name: Dragonslayer Jarvan IV
skins.description: All are accepted into the ranks of the dragonslayers, from the lowliest peasant to the mightiest king, for dragons would devour all equally. Jarvan IV willingly gave up the throne to join his doomed countrymen and stand against the fury of monsters reborn.

skins.name: Victorious Jarvan IV
skins.description: Victorious Jarvan IV was awarded to players who reached Gold or higher in the 2011 season. As the first Victorious skin ever released, Jarvan shines in silver armor with a flashy gold trim.

skins.name: Warring Kingdoms Jarvan IV
skins.description: A fabled warrior of peerless might, Jarvan IV strides across the Warring Kingdoms seeking only the worthiest opponents. All others careless enough to face him are crushed without mercy, the earth erupting beneath his immeasurable strength.

skins.name: Fnatic Jarvan IV
skins.description: Honoring Cyanide's winning performance as Jarvan IV during the 2011 World Championship.

skins.name: Dark Star Jarvan IV
skins.description: A mortal emperor unbound by the destruction of his world, Jarvan's essence has since been reforged by the ageless energies of deep space. His humanity and his people now lost forever, he stands ready to welcome the Dark Star incursion, in the final subjugation of all existence.

skins.name: SSG Jarvan IV
skins.description: Honoring Ambition's winning performance as Jarvan IV during the 2017 World Championship.

champions.name: Elise
champions.title: the Spider Queen
champions.shortBio: Elise is a deadly predator who dwells in a shuttered, lightless palace, deep within the oldest city of Noxus. Once mortal, she was the mistress of a powerful house, but the bite of a vile demigod transformed her into something beautiful, yet utterly inhumanâ€”a spider-like creature, drawing unsuspecting prey into her web. To maintain her eternal youth, Elise now prefers to feed upon the naive and the faithless, and there are few who can resist her seductions.

skins.name: Death Blossom Elise
skins.description: An enchanting beauty she is, lithe in form, and colored like the flowering valleys frozen mid-bloom by winter's chill. Yet the creature Elise dines upon the flesh of maidens, allured by her delicate pulchritude, who dance softly into the jaws of a monster.

skins.name: Victorious Elise
skins.description: Victorious Elise was awarded to players who reached Gold or higher in the 2013 season. Spin a wicked web for your enemies in gold-trimmed armor and deep purple robes, and chuckle as they struggle.

skins.name: Blood Moon Elise
skins.description: A revered priestess of the Blood Moon cult, Elise has so wholly intertwined her body with her demon spirit that they are now a single entity. She has traveled beyond all known civilization, existing in the apocryphal darkness hanging beyond the precipice of the world.

skins.name: SKT T1 Elise
skins.description: Honoring Bengi's winning performance as Elise during the 2015 World Championship. This is Bengi's second World Champion skin, following his win with SKT at the 2013 World Championship.

skins.name: Super Galaxy Elise
skins.description: Once a promising cadet, Elise discovered that her metamorphic power enabled her transformation into a mechanical arachnoid at will. Now, she seeks to reign as an evil, immortal Spider Queenâ€”seeing all the galaxy not as a home to defend, but a realm to be conquered.

champions.name: Orianna
champions.title: the Lady of Clockwork
champions.shortBio: Once a curious girl of flesh and blood, Orianna is now a technological marvel comprised entirely of clockwork. She became gravely ill after an accident in the lower districts of Zaun, and her failing body had to be replaced with exquisite artifice, piece by piece. Accompanied by an extraordinary brass sphere she built for companionship and protection, Orianna is now free to explore the wonders of Piltover, and beyond.

skins.name: Sewn Chaos Orianna
skins.description: Even the bravest children shy away from Oriannaâ€”a raggedy, whispering doll as old as the house itself. Some toys just aren't meant to be played with.

skins.name: TPA Orianna
skins.description: Honoring Toyz's winning performance as Orianna during the 2012 World Championship.

skins.name: Winter Wonder Orianna
skins.description: A strange clockwork girl imbued with the magic of the Winterlands, Orianna once lived within a snowglobe created by a kindly old inventor. At the end of his life he freed her, and now she searches for greater purpose, serving in the court of the Poro King.

skins.name: Heartseeker Orianna
skins.description: A mechanical girl built to find and comfort broken hearts, Orianna still does not understand why people run from her when she's only trying to help them. Still, she goes about her duties diligently, performing beautiful clockwork dances for any who would give her a chance.

skins.name: Dark Star Orianna
skins.description: Born out of the remnants of a magnificently advanced system, Orianna serves the Dark Star with meticulous precision. She dances across galaxies in an endlessly horrifying performance, the only witness is the silent trail of destruction left in her wake.

skins.name: Victorious Orianna
skins.description: Victorious Orianna was awarded to players who reached Gold or higher in 2 Ranked Queues for Season 8. Her body has been reforged by Piltover's finest artificers, and enhanced with experimental hextech.

champions.name: Wukong
champions.title: the Monkey King
champions.shortBio: Wukong is a vastayan trickster who uses his strength, agility, and intelligence to confuse his opponents and gain the upper hand. After finding a lifelong friend in the warrior known as Master Yi, Wukong became the last student of the ancient martial art known as Wuju. Armed with an enchanted staff, Wukong seeks to prevent Ionia from falling to ruin.

skins.name: Volcanic Wukong
skins.description: A greater Infernal whose power is drawn from the molten rock bubbling beneath the earth, Wukong's rage causes mountains to split, lava to rain from the sky, and rivers to become blackened glass. Still, he will never back down from any challengeâ€”and this, perhaps, will be the key to his defeat.

skins.name: Jade Dragon Wukong
skins.description: Imbued with the power of the legendary jade dragon, Wukong has honed his abilities to a razor sharp point.Though still headstrong and brash, his newfound power is undeniableâ€”a worrying sign to his master, as the jade dragon carries a powerful curse...

skins.name: Underworld Wukong
skins.description: Once a pupil of the martial arts, Wukong trained under his masters' strict traditions and doctrines. In him, Death saw limitless potential, and chose to claim the disregarded student for the underworld instead. Now, Wukong fights alongside the undying hordes, no longer bound by the rules of the living.

skins.name: Radiant Wukong
skins.description: An ascendant being of nearly limitless power, Radiant Wukong has undertaken a great journey to test his skills against history's greatest warriors. However, overcoming his quick temper and impulsive nature might be his greatest challenge yet.

skins.name: Lancer Stratus Wukong
skins.description: Another of the ancient, mechanized Lancer units, Wukong arises from his dusty slumber in times of extreme danger, protecting the outland city-states from the most dire threats. Once these foes are eliminated he returns to the earth, an enigma older than recorded history.

champions.name: Brand
champions.title: the Burning Vengeance
champions.shortBio: Once a tribesman of the icy Freljord named Kegan Rodhe, the creature known as Brand is a lesson in the temptation of greater power. Seeking one of the legendary World Runes, Kegan betrayed his companions and seized it for himselfâ€”and, in an instant, the man was no more. His soul burned away, his body a vessel of living flame, Brand now roams Valoran in search of other Runes, swearing revenge for wrongs he could never possibly have suffered in a dozen mortal lifetimes.

skins.name: Vandal Brand
skins.description: The wasteland is full of problems, and there's no better problem solver than Brand. Sure, his prices are a little high for a glorified thug, but nothing sends a hard message like a fistful of supernatural fire.

skins.name: Zombie Brand
skins.description: Before the mutagenic outbreak, Brand was a leading military scientist, responsible for the development of a powerful virus deep within a government compound. But the same government who elevated him among his peers suddenly cut his funding, forcing Brand to test the mutagen on himselfâ€¦ with disastrous results.

skins.name: Battle Boss Brand
skins.description: The fire boss from a bestselling action game, Brand has no intention of returning to his original machine. He'd rather see all of Arcade World burn to the ground, to be rebuilt in the image of the villains who rule it.

champions.name: Lee Sin
champions.title: the Blind Monk
champions.shortBio: A master of Ionia's ancient martial arts, Lee Sin is a principled fighter who channels the essence of the dragon spirit to face any challenge. Though he lost his sight many years ago, the warrior-monk has devoted his life to protecting his homeland against any who would dare upset its sacred balance. Enemies who underestimate his meditative demeanor will endure his fabled burning fists and blazing roundhouse kicks.

skins.name: Dragon Fist Lee Sin
skins.description: A famed martial artist beloved the world over, Lee Sin prefers to train far away from the public eye, honing his craft in solitude. Rumors claim that he can punch with the fury of a dragonâ€”but if anyone knows for sure, they're not talking.

chromas.name: Dragon Fist Lee Sin
chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during 2018.

skins.name: Pool Party Lee Sin
skins.description: Lee Sin loves the feeling of the sand between his toes, the sound of the crashing waves, and the warm sun against his skin. He also loves a strong coconut drink. Lee Sin likes to party.

skins.name: SKT T1 Lee Sin
skins.description: Honoring Bengi's winning performance as Lee Sin during the 2013 World Championship.

skins.name: Knockout Lee Sin
skins.description: 'Knockout' Lee Sin is a brutal pit fighter, who made his name in the underground circuit, before leaving the bloody sport for greener, more criminal pastures. He currently sells his services as a â€śproblem-solverâ€ť to a select group of monied kingpins.

skins.name: God Fist Lee Sin
skins.description: The arrogant wielder of the God Fist was once a mortal boy, tasked by his predecessor to defeat the master of each martial arts school while blindfolded, before facing him at the peak of a treacherous mountain. Emerging victorious, the boy assumed his titleâ€”as well as his immortal sight.

skins.name: Playmaker Lee Sin
skins.description: With a sixth sense for openings in any and all situations, Lee Sin can turn the opposing team's sloppy free kick into a once-in-a-lifetime play talked about for generations to come. Though it's his first year in the majors, some are saying there may never be another player like him.

champions.name: Vayne
champions.title: the Night Hunter
champions.shortBio: Shauna Vayne is a deadly, remorseless Demacian monster hunter, who has dedicated her life to finding and destroying the demon that murdered her family. Armed with a wrist-mounted crossbow and a heart full of vengeance, she is only truly happy when slaying practitioners or creations of the dark arts, striking from the shadows with a flurry of silver bolts.

skins.name: Dragonslayer Vayne
skins.description: Many heeded the call of the dragonslayers as they mustered their forces, from common cutpurses to fabled monster hunters. Vayne was one such legendary recruitâ€”for what is a dragon, if not the deadliest beast of all?

skins.name: Heartseeker Vayne
skins.description: Take a tumble with Heartseeker Vayne, the season of romance's number one exterminator of supernatural horrors! With her trusty crossbow, iron will, and years of brutal training, she'll make sure no heart will ever escape her grasp.

skins.name: SKT T1 Vayne
skins.description: Honoring Piglet's winning performance as Vayne during the 2013 World Championship.

skins.name: Arclight Vayne
skins.description: Empowered by the Arclight, the slayer Vayne was shown the creeping darkness lurking beneath the foundations of the world. Tasked to fight it back at all costs, she will stop at nothing to drive each new horror from whence it came.

skins.name: PROJECT: Vayne
skins.description: Augmented with classified tech, Vayne was once a member of PROJECT's counter-espionage unit. After she was betrayed by the corporation she served, she now stalks the shadows as a vigilante, searching for ways to break PROJECT and the technology that haunts her soul.

champions.name: Rumble
champions.title: the Mechanized Menace
champions.shortBio: Rumble is a young inventor with a temper. Using nothing more than his own two hands and a heap of scrap, the feisty yordle constructed a colossal mech suit outfitted with an arsenal of electrified harpoons and incendiary rockets. Though others may scoff and sneer at his junkyard creations, Rumble doesn't mindâ€”after all, he's the one with the flamespitter.

skins.name: Super Galaxy Rumble
skins.description: Founder of the Super Galaxy Defense Force, Rumble always dreamed of saving the worldâ€¦ with his â€śexplosive face-meltersâ€ť and â€ścourageous giga-guardsâ€ť. To this day, his allies still have no idea what those terms mean, but they don't question itâ€”because a yordle operating a volcanic flame-spitting mech can be a very volatile thing.

skins.name: Badlands Baron Rumble
skins.description: Nothing turns a traveler's blood cold like seeing Rumble in the distance, his iron death buggy chugging thick clouds of irradiated smoke. That means someone's got his attention, and those with Rumble's attention have a nasty habit of becoming very, very dead.

champions.name: Cassiopeia
champions.title: the Serpent's Embrace
champions.shortBio: Cassiopeia is a deadly creature bent on manipulating others to her sinister will. Youngest and most beautiful daughter of the noble Du Couteau family of Noxus, she ventured deep into the crypts beneath Shurima in search of ancient power. There, she was bitten by a gruesome tomb guardian, whose venom transformed her into a viper-like predator. Cunning and agile, Cassiopeia now slithers under the veil of night, petrifying her enemies with her baleful gaze.

skins.name: Desperada Cassiopeia
skins.description: Enterprising creatures of the Old West often fall in with more successful bandit clans, serving as nightmarish enforcers, unafraid of a little casual violence. Cassiopeia became infamous as one such outlaw, but following a bloody coup now leads an enclave of her own.

skins.name: Siren Cassiopeia
skins.description: A humanoid marine serpent known for luring sailors to their deaths, Cassiopeia has a bad reputation and wants to set the record straight. She'd need to stop turning interviewers to stone for that to work, but at least she's trying.

skins.name: Jade Fang Cassiopeia
skins.description: An adherent to the teachings of the legendary jade dragon, Cassiopeia keeps its archaic rituals secret and the beast's true nature shrouded in mystery. In recognition she has been granted a fragment of the creature's power, and awaits the day when it will drown the world in evil.

champions.name: Skarner
champions.title: the Crystal Vanguard
champions.shortBio: Skarner is an immense crystalline scorpion from a hidden valley in Shurima. Part of the ancient Brackern race, Skarner and his kin are known for their great wisdom and deep connection to the land, as their souls are fused with powerful life crystals which hold the living thoughts and memories of their ancestors. In an age long past, the Brackern entered hibernation to avoid untold magical destruction, but recent, threatening events have roused Skarner. As the only Brackern awake, he strives to protect his kind from those who seek to harm them.

skins.name: Sandscourge Skarner
skins.description: Travelers seeking their fortune on the open prairie must take special care at night, when massive, carnivorous scorpions are lured by the flickering light of campfires. More than one caravan has been lost to the creatures, the bones of their passengers picked clean.

skins.name: Battlecast Alpha Skarner
skins.description: An early prototype that would pave the way for the Battlecast machines, Alpha Skarner is possessed of an extreme rage not seen in later models. Perhaps the brain inside it wishes to inflict as much pain as it experiencesâ€”or maybe it just likes to kill things.

skins.name: Guardian of the Sands Skarner
skins.description: Skarner, the gilded scorpionâ€”ancient guardian of the sands, we invoke thee to protect us from an evil of our own making. Let no man tread upon these hallowed grounds, lest in your rage they are torn asunder.

champions.name: Heimerdinger
champions.title: the Revered Inventor
champions.shortBio: A brilliant yet eccentric yordle scientist, Professor Cecil B. Heimerdinger is one of the most innovative and esteemed inventors Piltover has ever known. Relentless in his work to the point of neurotic obsession, he thrives on answering the universe's most impenetrable questions. Though his theories often appear opaque and esoteric, Heimerdinger has crafted some of Piltover's most miraculousâ€”not to mention lethalâ€”machinery, and constantly tinkers with his inventions to make them even more efficient.

skins.name: Piltover Customs Heimerdinger
skins.description: Heimerdinger moonlights as part owner of the city's most infamous customs dealer, where he generally adds an external engine and flame paint to vehicles of the rich and famous. Get him on a good day, though, and he'll build you a real monsterâ€”for a price.

skins.name: Snowmerdinger
skins.description: Brought to life by the power of a magic hat, Snowmerdinger now pursues theoretical Snowdown sciences including snowball trajectory, cocoa cooling speeds, and automated turret construction. He engineered his own strain of carrot noses.

skins.name: Dragon Trainer Heimerdinger
skins.description: Dragon training, to the few who understand it, seems to be the sole domain of yordles. Heimerdinger has long believed that dragons and humankind can peacefully coexist, citing centuries of his own successful research. His current dragon hatchling, Pythagoras, holds no opinion on the subject.

champions.name: Nasus
champions.title: the Curator of the Sands
champions.shortBio: Nasus is an imposing, jackal-headed Ascended being from ancient Shurima, a heroic figure regarded as a demigod by the people of the desert. Fiercely intelligent, he was a guardian of knowledge and peerless strategist whose wisdom guided the ancient empire of Shurima to greatness for many centuries. After the fall of the empire, he went into self-imposed exile, becoming little more than a legend. Now that the ancient city of Shurima has risen once more, he has returned, determined to ensure it never falls again.

skins.name: Pharaoh Nasus
skins.description: Immortal beast of the northern lands, Nasus wanders the expanse of the Great Desert in search of his once-green kingdom. He conjures vast sandstorms to cover his tracks, hiding his existence from the world.

skins.name: Riot K-9 Nasus
skins.description: A Riot Games skin obtained by either meeting a Rioter or attending an official Riot event in 2011 or 2012.

skins.name: Infernal Nasus
skins.description: The greater Infernals are somehow even more cruel and hateful than their lesser counterparts, and Nasus is no exception. A three-headed monstrosity raised from some far-flung, hellish abyss, he withers life with his merest touchâ€¦ then burns it away.

skins.name: Worldbreaker Nasus
skins.description: The last of four titans prophesied to shatter the world, Nasus is the true end of all things. A monstrous abomination of smoke and flame, he will emerge from the bottom of the earth in a column of hungry fire, devouring all of existence.

skins.name: Lunar Guardian Nasus
skins.description: A gift to the young Lunar Empress, Nasus was raised alongside her to guard the immortal realm from an ancient darkness. Stoic but powerful, he stands watch in the north, annihilating all who would threaten the land.

chromas.name: Lunar Guardian Nasus
chromas.description: Bundle exclusive from the 2018 Lunar Revel event.

champions.name: Nidalee
champions.title: the Bestial Huntress
champions.shortBio: Raised in the deepest jungle, Nidalee is a master tracker who can shapeshift into a ferocious cougar at will. Neither wholly woman nor beast, she viciously defends her territory from any and all trespassers, with carefully placed traps and deft spear throws. She cripples her quarry before pouncing on them in feline formâ€”the lucky few who survive tell tales of a wild woman with razor-sharp instincts, and even sharper claws...

skins.name: Snow Bunny Nidalee
skins.description: A fierce warrior who makes her home in the winter forest, Nidalee isn't content with simple Snowdown parties. She plays the role of Santa for cheery woodland creatures, driving off intruders and protecting her furry friends from harm.

skins.name: Pharaoh Nidalee
skins.description: At the height of her power, Nidalee was worshipped as a god-queen of the Great Desert. After her city's fall, she gathered her remaining armies and marched west, to conquer and rule anew.

skins.name: Bewitching Nidalee
skins.description: She is a cat. That is a hat. Legally, we're not allowed to put those two thoughts together.

skins.name: Headhunter Nidalee
skins.description: It's one thing to be hunted by a human; it's another to be chased down by an animal. Nidalee's alien biology allows her bothâ€”a rare gift among the Headhunters.

skins.name: Warring Kingdoms Nidalee
skins.description: A wild, untamed fighter steeped in myth, it is difficult to know what is true of Nidalee and what is legend. Some say she fights with the ferocity of a white tiger, while others of the Warring Kingdoms believe she can become the creature itself.

skins.name: Super Galaxy Nidalee
skins.description: Nidalee shows the most promise of the new class of Super Galaxy cadets, a knack for throwing projectiles through zero-gravity being her signature talent. The team will need her cunning tactics, as well as her keen hunting instincts, if it is to defeat the Spider Queen.

champions.name: Udyr
champions.title: the Spirit Walker
champions.shortBio: Udyr is more than a man; he is a vessel for the untamed power of four primal animal spirits. When tapping into the spirits' bestial natures, Udyr can harness their unique strengths: The tiger grants him speed and ferocity, the turtle resilience, the bear might, and the phoenix its eternal flame. With their combined power, Udyr can turn back all those who would attempt to harm the natural order.

champions.name: Poppy
champions.title: Keeper of the Hammer
champions.shortBio: Runeterra has no shortage of valiant champions, but few are as tenacious as Poppy. Bearing the legendary hammer of Orlon, a weapon twice her size, this determined yordle has spent untold years searching in secret for the fabled â€śHero of Demacia,â€ť said to be its rightful wielder. Until then, she dutifully charges into battle, pushing back the kingdom's enemies with every whirling strike.

skins.name: Lollipoppy
skins.description: Lollipoppy is a legend to the people of the Candy Kingdom. Everyone remembers her face. Everyone.

skins.name: Ragdoll Poppy
skins.description: Once an innocent cloth doll, Poppy watched helplessly as toy soldiers knocked over her peaceful block village. Now she leads her people to war, their cotton hearts filled with vengeance.

skins.name: Star Guardian Poppy
skins.description: Fierce and no-nonsense, Poppy is often the first Star Guardian on the battle lines, ready to put her duty before everything else. With her trusty hammer, Poppy sees the universe as black and white: you're either here to smash anything that threatens the sanctity of the cosmos, or you're getting smashed.

skins.name: Snow Fawn Poppy
skins.description: The Poro King's right hand and loyal shield, Poppy enforces her furry liege's decrees and protects him from all harm. She also enjoys Snowdown festivities, a holiday she discovered on one of her many colorful adventures.

skins.name: Hextech Poppy
skins.description: Artificers of the Hextech renaissance owe much to Poppy, an expert engineer of the delicate craft. Having perfected the infusion of life into the inanimate, she now feverishly researches the ultimate scientific breakthroughâ€”the creation of an artificial soul.

champions.name: Gragas
champions.title: the Rabble Rouser
champions.shortBio: Equal parts jolly and imposing, Gragas is a massive, rowdy brewmaster on his own quest for the perfect pint of ale. Hailing from parts unknown, he now searches for rare ingredients among the unblemished wastes of the Freljord, trying each recipe as he goes. Often intoxicated and extremely impulsive, he is legendary for the brawls he starts, which often end in all-night parties and widespread property damage. Any appearance from Gragas must surely foreshadow drinking and destructionâ€”in that order.

skins.name: Santa Gragas
skins.description: Some might say Gragas would be the perfect Santa, and between his jolly frame and wild beard he certainly fits the bill. But Gragas is also very unreliable, constantly intoxicated, and starts fights seemingly at randomâ€”but he likes the costume, and no one is brave enough to take it back.

skins.name: Gragas, Esq.
skins.description: One of the city's top criminal defense attorneys, Gragas, Esquire is often seen carousing with the chief of police and various circuit court judgesâ€”mostly because they know he has access to the finest prohibited goodsâ€¦ but also because he's been paying them off for decades.

skins.name: Vandal Gragas
skins.description: Gragas causes enough trouble to be kicked out of every wasteland settlement twenty times over, but the man found a way to mix potent brew and unrefined gasoline into the staple beverage of the post-apocalypse. Might as well let him wreck a few bars. He's earned it.

skins.name: Superfan Gragas
skins.description: Gragas is Runeterra's biggest Order United fan, and he makes sure everyone knows it by leading chants, foregoing clothing for blue body paint, and making sure everyone around him is â€śadequately hydrated.â€ť

skins.name: Fnatic Gragas
skins.description: Honoring Shushei's winning performance as Gragas during the 2011 World Championship.

skins.name: Gragas Caskbreaker
skins.description: Gragas Caskbreaker is described in legend as both a pious, sun-worshipping cleric and a despicable drunk, depending on who tells the tale. He's not too familiar with Riftquest, but he does like fighting dragons and passing out in the middle of his combat actions.

skins.name: Arctic Ops Gragas
skins.description: A large man even before donning his hermetically sealed arctic combat suit, Gragas is a mystery to all save for High Command's secretive R&D labs. He appears human by all measures, save for the mask he never removes, and the eerily cold mixture of chemicals powering his massive frame.

champions.name: Pantheon
champions.title: the Artisan of War
champions.shortBio: The peerless warrior known as Pantheon is a nigh-unstoppable paragon of battle. He was born among the Rakkor, a warlike people living on the flanks of Mount Targon, and after climbing the mountain's treacherous peak and being deemed worthy, he was chosen to become the earthly incarnation of the celestial Aspect of War. Imbued with inhuman power, he relentlessly seeks the enemies of Targon, leaving only corpses in his wake.

skins.name: Dragonslayer Pantheon
skins.description: When dragon fire consumed the world, heroes rose from the embers and cast down the beasts of legend. These warriors passed into history, then mythâ€¦ but Pantheon alone remained, the last of the ancient dragonslayers.

skins.name: Slayer Pantheon
skins.description: A former mechanic at the same auto body shop Jinx once worked at, Pantheon dreamed of switching careersâ€¦ until a mutagenic virus turned everyone else into zombies. Slicing monsters in half with a chainsaw-spear is way more fun than replacing windshield wipers, anyway.

skins.name: Baker Pantheon
skins.description: He's the armored dough-puncher, the Targonian Aspect of tasty pastries. He always wanted to be a baker, and now he'll throw down in the ultimate cooking showdown. Put your hands together for Pantheon!

champions.name: Ezreal
champions.title: the Prodigal Explorer
champions.shortBio: A dashing adventurer, unknowingly gifted in the magical arts, Ezreal raids long-lost catacombs, tangles with ancient curses, and overcomes seemingly impossible odds with ease. His courage and bravado knowing no bounds, he prefers to improvise his way out of any situation, relying partially on his wits, but mostly on his mystical Shuriman gauntlet, which he uses to unleash devastating arcane blasts. One thing is for sureâ€”whenever Ezreal is around, trouble isn't too far behind. Or ahead. Probably everywhere.

skins.name: Nottingham Ezreal
skins.description: An adventuring elf from the outlying forest kingdoms, Ezreal likes to present himself as a â€śhandsome rogue-paladinâ€ť named Jarro Lightfeather. Very few people believe his claims of knighthood, but they serve as a decent enough distraction between his disastrous misadventures.

skins.name: Striker Ezreal
skins.description: A young and flashy prodigy, Ezreal is Order United's most popular player. Or at least he was, until a long series of teleportation-related fouls got him in trouble with the oversight committee.

skins.name: Frosted Ezreal
skins.description: Ezreal occasionally finds himself in the Freljord, searching for such-and-such ancient artifact. But braving sub-zero temperatures, terrifying ice beasts, and angry Freljordian tribes is a tall order, even for himâ€”that's why he goes in disguise. He's practically a different person!

skins.name: Explorer Ezreal
skins.description: Ezreal's almost suicidal obsession with braving tombs, ruins, forbidden temples, and abandoned cities has netted him a tidy handful of priceless relics. Most of those relics are sold off to pay exploration-related medical bills, but one of these daysâ€¦

skins.name: Pulsefire Ezreal
skins.description: Temporal fugitive and time-hopping explorer extraordinaire, Ezreal leaps across disparate realities searching for interesting technology to acquire. He is responsible for countless paradoxes and is currently wanted by the dystopian Remembrancers, who hunt him relentlessly.

skins.name: TPA Ezreal
skins.description: Honoring BeBe's winning performance as Ezreal during the 2012 World Championship.

skins.name: Debonair Ezreal
skins.description: Tailored suits, fitted vests, and an elegant gauntlet let everyone know the difference between Ezreal and the common rabble is simple. He makes this look good, and theyâ€¦ don't.

skins.name: Ace of Spades Ezreal
skins.description:
First is the Ace, at a hurtling pace,
A man of both talent and vim,
Who holds all the cards in the court of High Stakes
Because everything's about him.

skins.name: Arcade Ezreal
skins.description: A skilled gamer transported to Arcade World by Veigar, Ezreal holds the world record for speedrunning the original version of Hyper Crystal Dungeon in 45 seconds, using a custom-made mobile controller. Veigar has made a terrible mistake.

skins.name: Star Guardian Ezreal
skins.description: With a boundless curiosity about the universe, Ezreal is a born explorer, and becoming a Star Guardian only served to fuel his appetite for discovery. Though known to wander off, he always returns when most needed, especially now, as a certain pink-haired Guardian from another team has caught his attentionâ€¦

skins.name: SSG Ezreal
skins.description: Honoring BeBe's winning performance as Ezreal during the 2012 World Championship.

skins.name: Pajama Guardian Ezreal
skins.description: The First Star has burdened Ezreal with a lot. The responsibility. The hefty weight of destiny. The sparkly outfit (he's used to it). â€śAttending a slumber partyâ€ť was definitely not on the list of expected cosmic duties. Not that he minds, reallyâ€¦ as long as they don't actually try to braid his hair.

champions.name: Mordekaiser
champions.title: the Iron Revenant
champions.shortBio: The baleful revenant Mordekaiser is among the most terrifying and hateful spirits haunting the Shadow Isles. He has existed for countless centuries, shielded from true death by necromantic sorcery and the force of his own dark will. Those who dare face Mordekaiser in battle risk a horrific curse: He enslaves his victims' souls to become instruments of destruction.

skins.name: Dragon Knight Mordekaiser
skins.description: The ancient dragons first rose to the call of Mordekaiser, the self-proclaimed Dragon Knight. Through his evil, the world was ravaged by flame, until a newly-formed order of Dragonslayers finally defeated him. His story would become rumor, then myth, then legendâ€¦ at least, for now.

skins.name: Infernal Mordekaiser
skins.description: An ancient, Infernal general who attacks without feeling or remorse, Mordekaiser raises the incinerated corpses of his victims as soldiers for his own vast armies. They sweep across the world like a burning plague, annihilating all life.

skins.name: Pentakill Mordekaiser
skins.description: PENTAKILL's gigantic lead guitaristâ€”and a titan of the old worldâ€”Mordekaiser rocks with the fury of an epoch lost to time. Bigger than a two-story house, his guitar overflows with heavy metal licks rebuking the gods themselves.

skins.name: King of Clubs Mordekaiser
skins.description:
Third is the King, with a barbarous swing,
Who crushes the villains of old.
Though some folk may cry â€śHe's a villain himself!â€ť
A poorly kept secret, all told.

champions.name: Yorick
champions.title: Shepherd of Souls
champions.shortBio: The last survivor of a long-forgotten religious order, Yorick is both blessed and cursed with power over the dead. Trapped on the Shadow Isles, his only companions are the rotting corpses and shrieking spirits that he gathers to him. Yorick's monstrous actions belie his noble purpose: to free his home from the curse of the Ruination.

skins.name: Undertaker Yorick
skins.description: The Undertaker is a wretched creature, cursed to shoulder every secret his city has buried. These old, unhappy things tear constantly at his mind, which is itself infected by his queen's unending ambition.

skins.name: Pentakill Yorick
skins.description: Yorick was resurrected with the undying soul of heavy metal inside him for the singular purpose of joining PENTAKILL and melting faces with his bass guitar. He can also summon an army of roadie ghouls, a handy trick for any seasoned stage performer.

skins.name: Arclight Yorick
skins.description: The once-great king Yorick, given the gifts of power and immortality in an age long past, left his mighty kingdom to enforce the will of the divine. Hundreds of years later he returned, his lands naught but dust and ruins, and in his sorrow was consumed by madness.

champions.name: Akali
champions.title: the Rogue Assassin
champions.shortBio: Abandoning the Kinkou Order and her title of the Fist of Shadow, Akali now strikes alone, ready to be the deadly weapon her people need. Though she holds onto all she learned from her master Shen, she has pledged to defend Ionia from its enemies, one kill at a time. Akali may strike in silence, but her message will be heard loud and clear: fear the assassin with no master.

skins.name: Stinger Akali
skins.description: The Order of the Great Sparrow Bee follows a brutal, time-honored training regimen, teaching students to sting with the ferocity and ceaselessness of a hornet. Akali is their greatest champion, and she intends to take the art to even greater heights.

skins.name: Infernal Akali
skins.description: A djinn summoned from the world below, the Infernal known as Akali will burn her patron's enemies to cindersâ€¦ though the cost for such service is always dire.

skins.name: All-star Akali
skins.description: A legendary all-star for Chaos FC, Akali was known for her aggressive style on the pitch. These days, she spends most of her time mentoring children and doing commercials for shoes.

skins.name: Nurse Akali
skins.description: Hello, nurse! Goodbye, being alive.

skins.name: Blood Moon Akali
skins.description: Priestesses of the Blood Moon walk their own path, traveling far from the cult to pursue the whispers of their demons. A meditative figure living deep in the snow-dusted wood, Akali was the first woman to embrace her inner darkness, and speak directly with the Blood Moon itself.

skins.name: Silverfang Akali
skins.description: Former second-in-command of an honorable clan of assassins, Akali has broken from their ranks to find her own path. She plies her trade in the darkest corners of the world's largest metropolis, awaiting the day when she can establish a clan of her own.

skins.name: Headhunter Akali
skins.description: Her weapons flaring with alien energy, Akali hunts only the worthy in a dangerous game of life and death. Striking from anywhere at any moment, no living thing can escape her trophy wall.

skins.name: Sashimi Akali
skins.description: She's the fish ninja with speed on her side, the silent slicer, the death strike of deliciousness. Drop your guard and she'll assassinate your palate. It's your favorite and mine, Akali!

skins.name: K/DA Akali
skins.description: Akali's street aesthetic and hard-hitting lyrics inspired a dedicated fandom. She wields a microphone or kama as a hip-hop ninja, revolutionizing the stale scene with her raw talents.

skins.name: K/DA Akali Prestige Edition
skins.description: K/DA Akali is on fire right now, spitting rap solos at the Pop Music Awardsâ€”and her prestigious costume is exactly what you'd expect from the new golden child of pop.

champions.name: Kennen
champions.title: the Heart of the Tempest
champions.shortBio: More than just the lightning-quick enforcer of Ionian balance, Kennen is the only yordle member of the Kinkou. Despite his small, furry stature, he is eager to take on any threat with a whirling storm of shuriken and boundless enthusiasm. Alongside his master Shen, Kennen patrols the spirit realm, employing devastating electrical energy to strike down his enemies.

skins.name: Arctic Ops Kennen
skins.description: High Command's public stance towards ninjas are joking-to-nonexistent, as this is a war of modern weapons, not medieval flights of fancy. Privately, they deploy Kennen to hot zones in the deep Arctic, relying on his finely honed ninjitsu and deadly precision.

skins.name: Blood Moon Kennen
skins.description: A kingslaying demon summoned on the night of the Blood Moon, Kennen's purpose is to depose those in power and eliminate every member of their line. He is ruthless in this task, tearing across heavily armed fortress cities in the blink of an eye.

champions.name: Garen
champions.title: The Might of Demacia
champions.shortBio: A proud and noble warrior, Garen fights as one of the Dauntless Vanguard. He is popular among his fellows, and respected well enough by his enemiesâ€”not least as a scion of the prestigious Crownguard family, entrusted with defending Demacia and its ideals. Clad in magic-resistant armor and bearing a mighty broadsword, Garen stands ready to confront mages and sorcerers on the field of battle, in a veritable whirlwind of righteous steel.

skins.name: Rugged Garen
skins.description: Also known as â€śHandsome Garen,â€ť this wandering warrior and extremely original NPC was created by Braum for his Riftquest game. Garen eventually adopted the character as his own, liking the fantasy of himself, but rugged.

skins.name: Steel Legion Garen
skins.description: Garen is a steam-powered knight serving at the head of the Steel Legion's vanguard, feared by his enemies and respected by his allies in equal measure. His blade is one of a kind: a thaumaturgical innovation of science and magic, overflowing with sparking plasma.

skins.name: Rogue Admiral Garen
skins.description: A faded bounty poster from the Demacian naval authorities notes that Admiral Garen is a deadly adversary, and should be engaged with caution, lest he cut off your head and send it back to the capital. Each year, the Demacian naval authorities receive a disconcerting number of human heads.

skins.name: Warring Kingdoms Garen
skins.description: Brave guardian of Azir's ancient fortress, Garen is a mighty warrior who charges fearlessly into even the most hopeless battles. He fights for the glory of his ruler and the safety of his people, a powerful, if headstrong, force for justice.

chromas.name: Warring Kingdoms Garen
chromas.description: Loot exclusive gained from the 2018 Lunar Revel missions.

skins.name: God-King Garen
skins.description: God-King Garen stands as the last scion of an ancient divinity, and the final bulwark against the end of all civilization. He rules the vast kingdom of Demacia with an iron fist, jealously protecting his people as a self-styled messiah, while rooting out and destroying all who would oppose him.

champions.name: Leona
champions.title: the Radiant Dawn
champions.shortBio: Imbued with the fire of the sun, Leona is a holy warrior of the Solari who defends Mount Targon with her Zenith Blade and the Shield of Daybreak. Her skin shimmers with starfire while her eyes burn with the power of the celestial Aspect within her. Armored in gold and bearing a terrible burden of ancient knowledge, Leona brings enlightenment to some, death to others.

skins.name: Valkyrie Leona
skins.description: Hail the valkyrie, for she will descend upon the field of battle, and raise our greatest warriors into the halls of Valhalla! Those she doesn't take with her go to the underworld, or sometimes the ocean, though they don't tell you that before the whole 'dying in battle' thing.

skins.name: Pool Party Leona
skins.description: Leona is a former champion surfer, who enjoys spending her downtime relaxing on the beach with a light romance novel. Or pretty much any romance novel, in fact.

skins.name: PROJECT: Leona
skins.description: A heavy armor combatant, Leona has seen the truth behind the neon light of PROJECT, and now stands with Ashe and the G/NETIC rebellion. She carries a mounted ion charge shield, capable of blocking and stunning targets with its variable energy yield output.

skins.name: Barbecue Leona
skins.description: She's the solar pitmaster; the lean, mean, brisket queen. If her flavors don't stun you, that forty pound grill will. Please give a warm welcome to Leona!

skins.name: Solar Eclipse Leona
skins.description: Hearken! We beseech thee, O Savage Moon, and deign to bless with the vermillion shadow of thy celestial majesty. May this shield guard against the scourge of dark enchantments, which choke our land. May this blade be the hammer against the servants of witchery and evil. I, Leona, do take this oath forevermore.

skins.name: Lunar Eclipse Leona
skins.description: Hearken! We beseech thee, O Savage Moon, and deign to bless with the vermillion shadow of thy celestial majesty. May this shield guard against the scourge of dark enchantments, which choke our land. May this blade be the hammer against the servants of witchery and evil. I, Leona, do take this oath forevermore.

champions.name: Malzahar
champions.title: the Prophet of the Void
champions.shortBio: A zealous seer dedicated to the unification of all life, Malzahar truly believes the newly emergent Void to be the path to Runeterra's salvation. In the desert wastes of Shurima, he followed the voices that whispered in his mind, all the way to ancient Icathia. Amidst the ruins of that land, he gazed into the dark heart of the Void itself, and was gifted new power and purpose. Malzahar now sees himself as a shepherd, empowered to bring others into the foldâ€¦ or to release the voidling creatures that dwell beneath.

skins.name: Snow Day Malzahar
skins.description: Prophets of doom love a snow day as much as anybodyâ€”perhaps even more, since Malzahar knows everything will one day be swallowed by the Void. Clad in fashionable winter gear and flanked by an army of voidling poros, he's ready to usher in the snowball apocalypse.

chromas.name: Snow Day Malzahar
chromas.description: Loot exclusive gained from the 2018 Snowdown event.

skins.name: Battle Boss Malzahar
skins.description: A boss hailing from a long-forgotten game cabinet, Malzahar broke free from the last remaining copy of his game to invade nearby machines. Now he has made his way to Arcade World, shredding the code of his enemies with an army of intelligent viruses.

skins.name: Hextech Malzahar
skins.description: Upon hearing that the origin of hextech lay in his homeland of Shurima, Malzahar ventured out into the wastes alone. There, after suffering a life-changing revelation, he became its greatest messenger, claiming to see prophecies of the coming of a second hextech renaissance.

champions.name: Talon
champions.title: the Blade's Shadow
champions.shortBio: Talon is the knife in the darkness, a merciless killer able to strike without warning and escape before any alarm is raised. He carved out a dangerous reputation on the brutal streets of Noxus, where he was forced to fight, kill, and steal to survive. Adopted by the notorious Du Couteau family, he now plies his deadly trade at the empire's command, assassinating enemy leaders, captains, and heroesâ€¦ as well as any Noxian foolish enough to earn the scorn of their masters.

skins.name: Dragonblade Talon
skins.description: Legend says that Talon's blades were forged in the fire of a shadow dragon, and that he turned against his corrupt masters, cutting through them one by one before vanishing into the night. Many believe he will appear again whenever the strong take advantage of the weak.

skins.name: SSW Talon
skins.description: Honoring PawN's winning performance as Talon during the 2014 World Championship.

skins.name: Blood Moon Talon
skins.description: An anarchic demon summoned on the night of the Blood Moon, Talon was once a human assassin who surrendered his flesh during one of the cult's possession rituals. He now kills indiscriminately, relishing the terror in his victim's dying eyes.

skins.name: Enduring Sword Talon
skins.description: A haughty dragon king of the south seas, Talon accepted a duel from the demigoddess Irelia, only to be defeated in his own throne room. Humiliated, he lashed out at herâ€¦ and she sealed his power within her blade, tasking him with finding new purpose in the mortal realm.

chromas.name: Enduring Sword Talon
chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during 2018.

champions.name: Riven
champions.title: the Exile
champions.shortBio: Once a swordmaster in the warhosts of Noxus, Riven is an expatriate in a land she previously tried to conquer. She rose through the ranks on the strength of her conviction and brutal efficiency, and was rewarded with a legendary runic blade and a warband of her own. However, on the Ionian front, Riven's faith in her homeland was tested and ultimately broken. Having severed all ties to the empire, she now seeks to find her place in a shattered world, even as rumors abound that Noxus itself has been reforged...

skins.name: Championship Riven
skins.description: The first Championship skin released, celebrating the 2012 World Championship in North America.

skins.name: Dragonblade Riven
skins.description: One tale of the kingdoms tells of Riven, her sword forged in dragonfire, descending into an enemy enclave in the aftermath of battle. Slaying her foes and freeing their captives, she rampaged across the countryside, crushing any who would enslave the innocent.

chromas.name: Dragonblade Riven
chromas.description: Loot exclusive gained from the 2018 Lunar Revel missions.

skins.name: Arcade Riven
skins.description: Riven's part-time job at an arcade mostly involved playing dance simulators after her manager went home. Digitally transported to Arcade World by even scarier bosses, she's now using her moves (and some gear from her favorite RPG) to tear up Veigar's regime, one enemy at a time.

skins.name: Championship Riven 2016
skins.description: A revamped version of Championship Riven, celebrating the 2016 World Championship in North America.

chromas.name: Championship Riven 2016
chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive during 2018.

skins.name: Dawnbringer Riven
skins.description: Born from swirling energies at the dawn of creation, Riven is the living embodiment of order in the cosmos. Fated to clash against the Nightbringer for all time, she awaits a day when her light will finally break his darkness.

skins.name: Pulsefire Riven
skins.description: A worshipper of temporal purity, Riven knows there are many others who would rather see time manipulated in their favor. These heretics give her blade purposeâ€”she can only find true solace in eliminating all who would disturb the natural order.

champions.name: Kog'Maw
champions.title: the Mouth of the Abyss
champions.shortBio: Belched forth from a rotting Void incursion deep in the wastelands of Icathia, Kog'Maw is an inquisitive yet putrid creature with a caustic, gaping mouth. This particular Void-spawn needs to gnaw and drool on anything within reach to truly understand it. Though not inherently evil, Kog'Maw's beguiling naivetĂ© is dangerous, as it often precedes a feeding frenzyâ€”not for sustenance, but to satisfy its unending curiosity.

skins.name: Caterpillar Kog'Maw
skins.description: Kog'Maw, ever lost in thought, sat upon his toadstool until he was famished. â€śWonderland is full of such delights,â€ť he mused, gulping down the toadstool entirely. â€śIt would be a shame not to devour them all.â€ť

skins.name: Sonoran Kog'Maw
skins.description: Long considered a pest by frontier settlers, Kog'Maw critters have been growing in number as more dangerous beasts are pushed to the brink of extinction. And they are very, very hungry.

skins.name: Reindeer Kog'Maw
skins.description: It is rumored that Kog'Maw stole his glowing nose and deer antlers from a particularly adorable creature he devoured. Whether or not the theory is true, Kog'Maw is now the most famous reindeer of all.

skins.name: Lion Dance Kog'Maw
skins.description: It is unclear if Kog'Maw even understands what Lunar Revel is, but someone seems to have painted him for it. That person has presumably been eaten and digested, but Kog'Maw does look very festive.

skins.name: Battlecast Kog'Maw
skins.description: Mass-produced artillery units based on the now-extinct Kog'Maw organism, Viktor has invented an ingenious shell delivery system best appreciated from about a hundred miles awayâ€”the latest design's maximum range.

skins.name: Pug'Maw
skins.description: Pug'Maw is a nine month old purebred pug with a sweet disposition and possibly some sort of salivary problem. Great with children and pets. Highly food motivated. Has eaten three action figures and one doll, approach with extreme caution.

skins.name: Hextech Kog'Maw
skins.description: A newer Hextech innovation, Kog'Maw constructs are available as pets for wealthy families, delighting Piltover's upper crust with their friendly demeanor and intricately complex design. Though living things, they are viewed among the well-to-do as little more than status symbols.

champions.name: Shen
champions.title: the Eye of Twilight
champions.shortBio: Among the secretive, Ionian warriors known as the Kinkou, Shen serves as their leader, the Eye of Twilight. He longs to remain free from the confusion of emotion, prejudice, and ego, and walks the unseen path of dispassionate judgment between the spirit realm and the physical world. Tasked with enforcing the equilibrium between them, Shen wields blades of steel and arcane energy against any who would threaten it.

skins.name: Blood Moon Shen
skins.description: The most indomitable disciple, in mind and body, Shen's loyalty to the Blood Moon cult can never be shaken. He serves as the personal bodyguard of the group's most important figures, executing interlopers with a cool dispassion, suggesting part of his humanity has already been consumed.

skins.name: TPA Shen
skins.description: Honoring Stanley's winning performance as Shen during the 2012 World Championship.
